name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SheetsGPT - AI Google Sheets Formula Maker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI extension that uses AI to provide Sheets functions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our cutting-edge Chrome web extension, designed to revolutionize the way you interact with spreadsheets online. This AI-powered tool seamlessly integrates with your browser, bringing the power of advanced Google Sheets/Excel formulas directly to your fingertips, all without leaving your web page. Whether you're analyzing data on the web, managing online finance trackers, or working on shared project management sheets, our extension offers the ability to quickly create and explain formulas from natural language. 

Key Features:

Natural Language Processing: Simply type your desired action or calculation in plain English, and let our AI-powered extension do the rest. No more struggling with complex formula syntax.

Fine-tuned AI: Use our quick and simple AI model specifically trained on Google Sheets and Excel Formulas.

Instant Conversion: Experience real-time transformation of your natural language commands into Google Sheets formulas with lightning-fast speed. Say goodbye to tedious manual formula creation.

Accuracy and Efficiency: Our advanced AI algorithm ensures accurate interpretation of your commands, generating precise Google Sheets formulas tailored to your specific requirements.

Enhanced Productivity: Save valuable time and increase productivity by seamlessly integrating natural language processing into your Google Sheets or Excel workflow. Focus on analyzing data rather than wrestling with formula syntax.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design and user-friendly interface make it easy for users of all skill levels to harness the power of natural language to streamline spreadsheet tasks.

3 free credits per month, pro plan available at https://www.sheets-gpt.com/pricing/
